unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Constructing a 2-sample Mean Interval: Dunkin Bucks
question_text: Dunkin Bucks is interested in the number of cups of coffee their adults customers drink per day compared with their teenage customers. Dunkin Bucks randomly selects 75 adults and 75 teenagers and asks them: "How many cups of coffee do you drink?" The resulting data is below: N Average cups Standard Deviation Adults 75 1.8 0.6 Teenagers 75 1.3 0.3 Which of the following represents a 95 % confidence interval for the difference in the average number of cups of coffee drunk per day between Dunkin Bucks adult customers and teenage customers?
